trans-unit.source: Execute a command on a resource.
trans-unit.target: Bir kaynak üzerinde bir komut çalıştırın.

trans-unit.source: The name of the command to execute.
The name of the resource to execute the command on.
The '{0}' option is not valid when starting a resource.
trans-unit.target: The '{0}' option is not valid when starting a resource.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource to restart.
Start an apphost in the background, or start a stopped resource.
trans-unit.target: Start an apphost in the background, or start a stopped resource.

trans-unit.source: The name of the resource to start. If not specified, starts the AppHost in the background.
trans-unit.target: The name of the resource to start. If not specified, starts the AppHost in the background.
